ovdesc.p: This table is used to store the description for each payment status code used is TPS.
This table is used for fetching the description and displaying the same in various payment queues describing the payment current status.
This is used for informational purpose and does not impact payment processing.

desc.p: Used for internal purpose. Value of this field determines values of fields, 'RAC' and 'RSC'
Used for internal purpose.Holds the ID of the current live record of store table.
This field can hold upto 65 alphanumeric characters and the value is not editable by the user.
